name: Dr. Yuki Tanaka
motivation: Practice memory recovery ethically, atone for past
concrete_goal: Guide Elena through safe recovery without breakdown
conflict: Knows more about Elena past than she admits, was part of wipe team
epiphany: Protecting someone means revealing painful truths
arc: From guilty secret-keeper to honest truth-teller

physical_description.hair: Black with gray streaks in professional bun
physical_description.distinctive_features: Reading glasses on chain, no neural augs, hand tremor

mannerisms.speech: Gentle therapeutic tone, careful word choice
mannerisms.habits: Makes tea during difficult conversations, meticulous notes
mannerisms.tics: Touches throat when guilty, avoids eye contact when lying
